sentences.en: Astronomers then measure this glow and use it to correct telescope settings to overcome the blurring effect of the atmosphere on far-off images.
sentences.cn: 天文学家然后测量这个辉光，用它来纠正望远镜的设置以克服大气对遥远图像所造成的模糊效果。

sentences.en: He pointed the telescope at a deer on the hillside.
sentences.cn: 他把望远镜对着山坡上的一只小鹿.

sentences.en: I looked through a telescope.
sentences.cn: 我用望远镜看东西.

sentences.en: Its rings were discovered by telescope from Earth, but space probes later found that spectacular rings surround some other planets.
sentences.cn: 它的圆环是从地球上用望远镜发现的，但是太空探测器后来又发现了围绕其他一些星球的壮观的圆环。

sentences.en: Lunar craters can be plainly seen with the aid of a small telescope.
sentences.cn: 借助小型望远镜可以看清月球上的环形山.

sentences.en: Many stars are invisible without a telescope.
sentences.cn: 许多星辰不用望远镜便看不见.

sentences.en: Seat the telescope on the tripod.
sentences.cn: 把望远镜安装在三脚架上.

sentences.en: She resolved to make a telescope.
sentences.cn: 她决心做一架望远镜.

sentences.en: The captain was rectifying his telescope.
sentences.cn: 船长正在调他的望远镜。

sentences.en: The front of the car telescoped when it hit the wall.
sentences.cn: 汽车撞在墙上，车头都撞瘪了。

sentences.en: The space telescope has taken the clearest pictures ever of Pluto.
sentences.cn: 太空望远镜拍摄到了迄今为止最清晰的冥王星的照片。

sentences.en: The telescope reveals many distant stars to our sight.
sentences.cn: 望远镜把许多遥远的星球显现在我们的眼前.

sentences.en: This is a telescope that penetrates to the remote parts of the universe.
sentences.cn: 这是一架能看到宇宙中遥远地方的望远镜.

sentences.en: to look at the stars through a telescope
sentences.cn: 用望远镜观察星星

sentences.en: We have two blankets and a telescope.
sentences.cn: 我有两个毯子和一个望远镜。

sentences.en: What is the range of this telescope?
sentences.cn: 这架望远镜的有效距离多大?。

sentences.en: With a telescope you can see the huge crater of Ve - suvius.
sentences.cn: 用望远镜你能看到巨大的维苏威火山口.

sentences.en: With a telescope you can see the huge crater of Vesuvius.
sentences.cn: 用望远镜你能看到巨大的维苏威火山口。

sentences.en: With the aid of a telescope a ship could be made out on the horizon.
sentences.cn: 借助望远镜可以看出在地平线上有一只船.

sentences.en: You can't see through the telescope until it is adjusted to your eyes.
sentences.cn: 你不把望远镜调好是看不见东西的.

words.tran_cn: 望远镜的；[眼科] 远视的；套管式伸缩的；眼力好的；有先见之明的
望远镜使用法；[光] 望远镜制造学
缩短，压缩（telescope的过去分词形式）

phrases.tran_cn: n. 天文望远镜（等于Kepler telescope）
电波望远镜；无线电天文望远镜

trans.tran_en: a piece of equipment shaped like a tube, used for making distant objects look larger and closer
to make a process or set of events happen in a shorter time
